song_lyrics: Sat chid ānand jenu nām chhe jo... Sahajānandjī° 1
Divya chaitanya Akṣhar jenu ghar chhe jo,
Kṣhar Akṣhar thakī e to par chhe jo... Sahajānandjī° 2
Divya dvibhuj sadā sākār chhe jo,
Sarvakartā prerak ne ādhār chhe jo... Sahajānandjī° 3
Megh Shyām sundar naṭ vesh chhe jo,
Koṭi Kandarp lāvaṇyatā uddesh chhe jo... Sahajānandjī° 4
Rūp, shīl ne swabhāv sukhrūp chhe jo... Sahajānandjī° 5
Evā pragaṭ thayā jan kāraṇe jo,
Premānand jāye vāramvār vāraṇe jo... Sahajānandjī° 6
title: Sahajānandjī sanehī sukhdhām chhe jo

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-649: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad

Raag(s): Megh (Malhãr)
